Description.Text: Vintage is a modern 3-star property offering convenient accommodation close to Sheremetyevo International Airport. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and parking and a complimentary airport shuttle. The hotel is situated approximately 11km from the airport terminals in the leafy suburbs north of Moscow. Regional places of interest include the majestic Moskva River and several woods, lakes and out-of-town shopping complexes. Novopodrezkovo train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to central Moscow. The hotel is housed in a 19th-century building with a smart facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple style with tasteful colours, carpeted floors and dark wood furniture. Amenities include two bottles of mineral water, a flat-screen satellite TV and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a one-way complimentary airport shuttle service.
